title: Process a Listing Price Change
description: A seller has agreed to lower the price of their listed property. The agent needs to update the MLS and marketing materials.

tasks.description: Obtain written confirmation (e.g., price reduction addendum) from the seller for the new price.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives a signed document authorizing the price change.

tasks.description: Update the price in the MLS listing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The list price is successfully changed in the MLS system.

tasks.description: Notify all agents who have previously shown the property of the price reduction.
tasks.expected_outcome: A mass email is sent to all agents who have shown the property or saved the listing.
